title: Hash Browned Potatoes With Sesame Seeds Recipe
full_text:
Hash Browned Potatoes With Sesame Seeds Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
30 mins
Total
30 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
potatoes
, peeled, and chopped into little squares
1/4
cup
butter
1/3
cup
sesame seeds
1/2
onion
, minced
1/4
cup
heavy cream
Salt and pepper
Directions
Boil the potato squares until just tender.
Heat a medium-sized sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the sesame seeds and onion. Cook until slightly browned.
Toss in the potatoes, cream, and salt and pepper to taste. Cook until golden brown and delicious.
